metadata.title: CVE-2022-4900 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in PHP where setting the environment variablePHP_CLI_SERVER_WORKERS to a large value leads to a heap buffer overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-4900` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php8.2 - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
libphp8.2-embed - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2 - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-bcmath - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-bz2 - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-cgi - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-cli - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-common - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-curl - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-dba - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-enchant - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-fpm - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-gd - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-gmp - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-imap - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-interbase - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-intl - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-ldap - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-mbstring - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-mysql - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-odbc - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-opcache - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-pgsql - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-phpdbg - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-pspell - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-readline - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-snmp - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-soap - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-sqlite3 - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-sybase - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-tidy - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-xml - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-xsl - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
php8.2-zip - 8.2.10-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php8.2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.2.10-2ubuntu1').
